attributes.action: Disclose Bilderberg Group decisions affecting the UK electorate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Both Gordon Brown and Tony Blair (amongst many other ministers of this and previous Governments) have attended meetings of the Bilderberg Group in the Netherlands. These meetings are attended by heads of Government and private industry from around the world and are held behind closed doors. The people of the United Kingdom, who have elected Her Majesty’s Government, have a right to know the detail and effect of any and all decisions made by this unelected body which may affect the United Kingdom in any manner whatsoever.
